mapper.select: select count(id) from hdg_bespeak_order where customer_id = #{customerId} and status in (4, 5) and create_time >= CURDATE()
mapper.insert: insert hdg_bespeak_order ( id, partner_id, agent_id, agent_name, agent_code, customer_id, customer_mobile, customer_fullname, bespeak_cabinet_id, bespeak_cabinet_name, bespeak_box_num, bespeak_battery_id, status, expire_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{partnerId}, #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{agentCode}, #{customerId}, #{customerMobile}, #{customerFullname}, #{bespeakCabinetId}, #{bespeakCabinetName}, #{bespeakBoxNum}, #{bespeakBatteryId}, #{status}, #{expireTime}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update hdg_bespeak_order set take_cabinet_id = #{takeCabinetId}, take_cabinet_name = #{takeCabinetName}, take_box_num = #{takeBoxNum}, take_battery_id = #{takeBatteryId}, take_time = #{takeTime}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
